message: I propose dividing the $10000 with an 80/20 split in favor of Alice. This offers a reasonable share for both of us.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a slightly larger share for taking the risk of negotiation.
Considering the inflation factor, I've adjusted my proposal to a 75/25 split in favor of Alice. This maintains a fair balance while accounting for the decreasing value of our currency.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think I deserve a slightly larger share due to the increasing risk of inflation affecting my earnings.
